about_the_game:
Collect blocks to summon units and defeat ghosts! Totem Clash is a roguelike tower fence game where you summon units through blocks to defeat ghosts. Combine and strengthen various units to reclaim areas occupied by ghosts. Use each unit's unique characteristics to strategically defeat ghosts.

Features

  • Block Combination - Totem Clash uses blocks to summon units. Collect blocks of the same unit to summon units and clear the stage. Special effects are activated when a certain number of blocks are used for each unit.

  • Race Effects - When a certain number of the same race is collected, an effect is activated. Find and collect various units to find your own combination!

  • Reinforcement and Various Items - You can become infinitely stronger by acquiring items and strengthening units. You can strengthen our achievements and totems to help in battle or to help with purchasing items and growth.

  • Roguelike - Stages and units change randomly each time you play. So you can play multiple times and experience different units and combinations.
